thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: Deborah LaMontagne
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Deborah LaMontagne

author: Deborah LaMontagne
title: Deborah LaMontagne
text:
I DIDN'T UNDERSTAND THE WAY YOUR TEXT MESSAGES WERE DELIVERED. I DIDN'T KNOW I JUST NEEDED TO WAIT. USUALLY, YOU HAVE TO CLECIK ON SOMETHING. MY MISTAKE. AND THERE WAS
A LITTLE CONFUSION ABOUT HOW TO DELIVER THE CERTIFICATE.
HOWEVER, EVERYTHING WAS RESOLVED BY LAURA AND MIKE.
MANY THANKS.
DEB AND TIA LAMONTAGNE
